modName: Silent Tradeskills - No Crafting Sound Effects
summary: This mod simply replaces the crafting confirmation sounds with silence.
descriptionHtml:
No more shenanigans, no more tomfoolery, no more ballyhoo.

Silenced Alchemy Sounds:
Poison creation, potion creation, fail to create, learn new effect

Silenced Enchanting Sounds:
Create item, destroy item, learn new effect, item recharge (01 & 02)

Silenced Smithing Sounds:
Create item (01 & 02), improve armor (01 & 02), improve weapon (01 & 02)

========================================================================

Great to use with ZeRo2545\'s forge volume reduction mod:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5085

I also recommend peckham\'s Non-Squeaky Grindstone mod:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5306
author: deadfables
